price: 241. Mpe mpona basi bakufeli mabala esengeli kosalela bango limemia na lolenge ya malamu, ezali lotomo likolo ya babangi.
arabic: وَلِلۡمُطَلَّقَٰتِ مَتَٰعُۢ بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِۖ حَقًّا عَلَى ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walil'muṭallaqāti matāʿun bil-maʿrūfi ḥaqqan ʿalā al-mutaqīna
